channel.title: Ad Hoc on Pritpal Singh
channel.description: Recent content in Ad Hoc on Pritpal Singh

item.title: Is Random Really Random?
item.description: Have you ever paused while using a “random” function on your computer and thought, “Is this truly random, or is my machine just pretending?” If you haven’t, don’t worry—you’re in the company of most people who haven’t taken a deep dive into this existential query. But today, we’re peeling back the layers of randomness to discover if our machines are indeed rolling the dice or just pulling a fast one on us.
